data.sentence: The word تَلَهَّى comes from the root ل ه و and is associated with the meanings: become diverted from it as to forget it, To preoccupy, beguile, distract, sport/play/amusement, divert, diversion, forget, delight/cheer, turn away, what is thrown, unmindful/careless.
